comments:
When debugging an Ant script it is not possible to view the properties of the process, as you can with a Java application.

While the Properties context menu is enabled for all children of the root node of the Debug view, selecting it generates an error dialog titled "Could Not Accept Changes", containing the message "The currently displayed page contains invalid values.", and an OK button.  When OK is clicked a Properties dialog opens (titled simply "Properties for") containing a single selected "Process Information" entry that displays the text "Run-at time:".  All very mysterious and smelling like "not implemented yet" behavior.

And the following stack trace is written to the log:
